tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TeamTrainingMaterials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name TEXT,
    resource_url TEXT,
    team_member_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE training_materials(
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  material_description TEXT,
  uploader_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (uploader_id) REFERENCES team_leaders(leader_id)
);

CREATE TABLE team_resources (
  resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name VARCHAR(255),
  resource_type VARCHAR(50),
  resource_link TEXT,
  upload_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE team_resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    resource_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    link VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    upload_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE TeamMembers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    team_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES TeamLeaders(id)
);

CREATE TABLE TeamTraining (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT NOT NULL,
    training_material_id INT NOT NULL,
    training_resource_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES TeamMembers(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (training_material_id) REFERENCES TrainingMaterials(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (training_resource_id) REFERENCES TrainingResources(id)
);
